name: Nuke Yourself to Alpha Centauri
description:
In 1958, Freeman Dyson theorized that an interstellar starship could be propelled by riding the plasma shockwave of nuclear bombs jettisoned out the back end of the starship.

By setting off a thermonuclear explosion every ten seconds humanity might reach the stars.

In a more reasonable timeline, more reasonable leaders might sign a Nuclear Test Ban Treaty, making further research impossible.

This is not that timeline.

--

Once you select your ship and difficulty level, press the space bar to pause the game and view game instructions!

--

This game was built from the ground up in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 51.
